#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--){
	
	int ip;
	cin>>ip;
	if(ip==0)	
	{
		cout<<"1"<<endl;
		continue;
	}
	
	int t=10000,len=5;
	while(ip/t==0)
	{
		t=t/10;
		len--;
	}

	if(t==1)
	{
		if(ip<9)
		cout<<ip+1<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"11"<<endl;
		
		continue;
	}
	
//	cout<<len;
	int st=t;

	int zeroes=len/2,k=len;
	int rt,rev=0,num=0,ten=1;
	
	while(k>len/2)
	{
		rt=ip/t;
		num=num*10+rt;
		rev=rev+rt*ten;
		k--;
		ip=ip%t;		
		t=t/10;
		ten=ten*10;
	};

//	cout<<rev;
//	cout<<" "<<num;
	t=t==0?10:t*10;
//	cout<<endl<<"t="<<t;

	int ans;
	if(ip%t<rev%t)	
	{
		ans=(num*t)+(rev%t);	
	}	
	else
	{
		ans=(num+1)*t;
		t=100000;
		ip=ans;
		ten=1;
		while(ans/t==0)
		{
			t=t/10;
		}	
		while(zeroes--)
		{
			ans=ans+(ip/t)*ten;			
			ten=ten*10;
			ip=ip%t;
			t=t/10;	
		}
	}

	
	cout<<ans<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
